experiences.description: Worked in a secure research environment to design and evaluate AI-driven virtual systems for defense. Contributed to custom algorithms, agent interactions, and advanced simulation tasks. Applied novel architectures to push performance boundaries in classified multi-agent and adversarial settings.

Developed agentic AI systems integrating both front-end interfaces and backend processing. Worked in a startup setting, optimizing data pipelines and model behavior. Implemented production-ready systems with strong Git-based version control.

Created and scaled a free programming camp to serve over 100 underserved students annually. Taught Agile programming practices and organized partnerships with nonprofits and government sponsors. Spearheaded all aspects from curriculum to logistics.
Built a cross-platform ticketing/eCommerce app in Flutter with backend integration using Google Cloud Platform. Focused on clean UI, scalability, and deployment-ready code for a startup client.
